name: Thiefly
description:
Thiefly.

You are a thief who want to steal some stuff avoiding some guards.

Controls:

E for pickup

Crouch to sneak and reduce detection rate

WASD to move arround the world

Objetive:

Collect all the outlined stuff holding E in the map and avoid to be seen.

Used stuff:

UE4-EpicGames started content

Game designed by Alejandro Apolinar(Apolejo1206@hotmail.com)

Game in progress...
